Texts.Chs: 我想我的头刚才撞到某样坚硬的物体上了...我设计出了一种全新的变形球，但不知道是不是有用...
Texts.Eng: I think I bumped my head a bit too hard or something...I devised a new distortion sphere but have no idea where this could be useful...

Texts.Chs: 现在变形球变得更有趣了，但请小心使用，因为它有些危险。
Texts.Eng: It should at least be fun to use, though I would caution against using it carelessly.
